name: The utility of writing tests for Javascript
description: When is it appropriate to write a Javascript test? How do you find a balance to ensuring the maximum quality fo your application and putting it in the hands of the public.

name: Learning a new coding language
description: The process of becoming comfortable with a new coding language is a daunting task for anyone. Here are ways to integrate that process into your everyday work.

name: Explaining what you do
description: The general public are inundated with information about programming and technology. Here are ways you can describe what you do to those outside of the industry.
